title: Interpretation of a boy in a dream and its meaning for good and evil

preview.html: If you want to know the interpretation of a dream about a boy in a dream and its meaning in “Interpretation of a dream about a boy”. We will present it to you through our article today from the Encyclopedia, as many of us dream of different visions and dreams, and when we wake up, we have a great desire to know the meaning of what we saw in our dream, and if it carries good or bad news. Certainly, the interpretations of scholars and translators differ according to the person, whether male or female, and they also differ according to the social status if the dreamer is single, single, married, married, pregnant, etc. Many divine messages come in the form of a dream, and from here we will talk in the following lines about one of the visions that many people have seen in their dreams, which is seeing a boy in a dream. We will present it in the following lines, all you have to do is follow usInterpretation of a boy in a dream by Ibn SirinThere are a number of interpretations suggested by Ibn Sirin in seeing a boy during a dream, which are as follows: If a person sees himself in a dream and has a group of young children with whom God has blessed him, this indicates the presence of anxiety and sadness, but it will not last long and his distress will soon go away. Because the dreamer feels very tired. Seeing a boy in a dream most often, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates the fragility and weakness that the dreamer may be exposed to, and thus he will not be able to achieve what he wants, and this interpretation may indicate his weakness. Weakness is the body and not the mind. Seeing a boy in a dream also indicates great comfort and ease that will increase over time after hardships. When one sees that he is carrying a boy in his hands, this means that he will manage property. If this dream is seen by an old man, this means that he will die, and if he sees a young man, this means that his son will grow up. If the dreamer sees a baby while breastfeeding, this is evidence that the person will receive good and sufficient nutrition, which is a sign that brings goodness with it and indicates the cessation of anxiety. Interpretation of seeing a boy in a dream by Ibn Sirin The dreamer sees this dream while he is committing some hidden sins, indicating that his matter will be revealed. Seeing a boy in a dream is a sign of the presence of an enemy and you should pay attention to this matter, he shows friendship at first, then shows hostility, but at first he is sad, with bad and bad. The intention, and he will take advantage of the difficult time that the seer is going through. One of the unpleasant visions is when one sees himself feeding a young boy, this means that he is gaining forbidden money and earning it in illegal and wrong ways. If the dreamer touches a young child during the dream, this is a sign that he will get a lot of money in the coming period. If the dreamer sees himself carrying a young boy, this is a sign of the dreamer’s work, investing money and taking many positions. If one sees a group of young children gathering around him, and they are close to him, this is evidence of his superiority and success in life, and this dream also carries good news for its owner, as it is evidence of his achievement. Aspirations and goals. One of the visions that carry evil within it is watching the boy running away from the seer, and this is evidence of

title: Interpretation of a dream about big girls by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about adult girls. Interpretation of a dream about big girls in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing big beautiful girls in a dream? What are the most accurate meanings of seeing eating with unknown older girls in a dream? Is fighting with older girls in a dream an interpretation worth mentioning or not? You will learn to interpret all these details from the article below. Do you have a confused dream? what are you waiting for; Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about older girls. The symbol of adult girls, if it appears in a dream, is interpreted through a large number of interpretations, and the interpretation will be determined according to the same vision as follows: Seeing adult girls dancing in obscene clothes in a dream: It is interpreted that religious life The dreamer is threatened by bad friends, and some jurists said that the symbol of dancing in the dream generally indicates harm and anguish that will soon grieve the dreamer. Seeing adult girls singing in a dream: indicates that happiness is approaching if the dreamer hears that these girls are singing beautiful and happy songs that carry phrases Full of positive energy, and if the dreamer sees in a dream big girls singing bad songs and their voices are scary, then this is not good. News he will hear soon. Dreaming of older girls wearing white clothes: It indicates a peaceful life, closeness to God and common sense that the dreamer maintains in reality. Seeing older girls in a bad condition: It indicates bad circumstances, the complication of matters, and failure in Work, and it is also interpreted as sorrows, bad life, and an increase in bad news. Do you dream of adult girls praying in a dream: This indicates the importance of supplicating to God and for the dreamer to pay attention to his prayers and worship in general, and if the dreamer saw that these girls were praying and the tears stopped from their eyes without hearing a sound About this crying, the dream is a sign of comfort, freedom, and enjoying life without restrictions. Seeing in a dream eating delicious food with older girls: It indicates a lot of sustenance from a legitimate source, especially if the dreamer sees that these girls are humble and that their appearance conveys comfort and positive energy. Interpretation of a dream about old girls by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that the symbol of a girl in a dream indicates kindness, and if an old girl is seen in a dream, it will be interpreted as marriage for a single person and may indicate the upcoming responsibility and burden in the dreamer’s life. If her appearance is poor. The dreamer, when he sees that he is sitting with older virgins in a bad situation, and they are talking in vile and irreligious dialogues, the dream shows the corruption of the dreamer as he follows his desires and is attracted to them. If the dreamer sees in a dream that old girls are offering him delicious food, he will reap the benefits of The fatigue and patience that he experienced while awake. If the old girls that the dreamer saw in his dream he already knows and they look beautiful, then this is good news that God will bless them with good circumstances and make things easier. title: Interpretation of a dream about feces coming out of the mouth

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about feces coming out of the mouth in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about feces coming out of the mouth in a dream, one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that. Therefore, we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, and they are the interpretations of some working scholars and not the interpretations of officials, and there is no interference in the interpretations on the site, but rather it conveys the interpretations of scholars.Interpretation of a dream about feces coming out of the mouth in a dream: Seeing feces coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate the end of diseases that The dreamer was suffering from it at that time. A dream of feces coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate the end of a financial crisis that the dreamer faced in his life at that time, thanks to God. In the event that a person saw that feces were coming out of his mouth, this may indicate the end of worries And the sorrow that the dreamer faced in the previous period. Seeing feces coming out of the mouth in a dream may indicate the psychological comfort that the dreamer will enjoy in the coming period, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of pus coming out of the left breast in a dream. If you dream of pus coming out of the left breast, this may indicate To many good things that will come to the dreamer in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that pus is coming out of his chest in the dream may indicate good events that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. In the event that he sees pus coming out of the chest, this may indicate forbidden money that The dreamer gets it and that he will get rid of it soon. Seeing pus coming out of the left breast in a dream may indicate the near relief that will happen to the dreamer in those days, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of a dead snake coming out of the anus in a dream A dead snake coming out of the anus in a dream can indicate The dream indicates the prosperity that visions achieve during this period. Anyone who dreams of a dead snake coming out of the anus may indicate the friendship that the dreamer enjoyed a lot in those days. The snake coming out of the anus in a dream may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through. In those days. Dreaming of a dead snake emerging from the anus in a dream could indicate recovery from diseases and relief of pain that the dreamer was suffering from at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a fetus emerging from the uterus in a dream in the case of a dead fetus emerging from the uterus in In a dream, this may indicate exposure to a difficult problem in those days and a major crisis. A dream about a dead fetus emerging from the womb could indicate difficulties and dangerous situations that the dreamer is going through during these days. In the event that a dead fetus is seen emerging from the mother’s womb, this may indicate weakness. It is dangerous that the dreamer may suffer in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing the dead fetus emerging from his mother’s womb indicates the physical obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing eating sugar in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In addition, its interpretation also varies depending on whether the fortuneteller sees himself preparing sugar, eating it, buying it, or someone gave it to him. Below we present the interpretation of visions and dreams by the great interpreters, including Ibn Sirin, and we deal with the interpretation of seeing sugar in a dream in all cases in detail as follows: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing sugar The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing sugar in a dream has good and bad connotations. It also indicates Eating a lot, and whoever sees that he is eating sugar will have great pride and blessings, and whoever sees that he is selling sugar in his dream, this is an indication that he will be exposed to a shameful situation. But he will survive, and God knows best, or he will be exposed to an attempt to be deceived by those who oppose him and expose them. Interpretation of a vision of sugar for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees sugar in her dream, it has many good signs. If she sees that she is eating it, this is a sign that she will hear the good news. It is also an indication of sweeping happiness. Her life in the coming period. Also, being drunk in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her wish will come true in the near future, God willing. But if she sees that she is buying sugar in a dream, this is good news for a good event or happy news about her engagement and marriage or earning a living. As for If she sees that someone is giving her sugar in a dream, then she will have a great benefit such as work or she will travel, so it is not good for her to eat a lot of sugar in the dream, as it warns her that she is following lusts and greed, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.Interpretation of seeing sugar for a married womanSugar In a married woman’s dream, it is one of the good dreams that have good meanings, as seeing her in a dream indicates stability in her married life and the intimate relationship between her and her husband, even if there are problems and disagreements between them, they will go away and finally, God willing, drunkenness in a married woman’s dream can That it is a sign of abundant sustenance, great benefits, and lawful profit, God willing. Interpretation of a vision of sugar for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees sugar in her dream, then her visions are good and glad tidings. They are an indication of the ease of childbirth, and good news that she will get what she desires, whether it is male or female. Sugar in a pregnant woman’s dream can indicate an improvement in her condition and an improvement in her health, and if she is sick, she will be cured of her fatigue and pain, God willing.

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money and its meaning according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money. We present to you through the Encyclopedia website that a person taking money from others in a dream increases his sense of happiness and believes that this is only a sign of the abundant goodness that awaits him and that he will obtain. The viewer, whether a married woman, a single girl, or a man, each case has a different interpretation, although we must note that the following explanations and interpretations of the vision are only from the point of view of the interpreter and that everything in life depends on God’s destiny and ability and on what He has written for us. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving you money. Most dream interpreters agree that money in a dream, whether it is banknotes or coins, is nothing but a praiseworthy vision that indicates a lot of goodness and satisfaction that Almighty God will give to the pioneer. In the following paragraphs we present to you the interpretation of the most famous scholars. Interpretation of dreams about seeing someone giving you money in a dream for all cases: married women, pregnant women, single women, and men, but in general, money in a dream indicates: Seeing a lot of money in a dream indicates wealth, goodness, sustenance, and blessing that God Almighty has given to the pioneer. He takes paper money and when he counts it, he finds that it is less than what is required. This is an undesirable vision because it indicates that he will suffer a financial loss. Some commentators believe that when a fortuneteller sees himself taking coins from someone he knows, this indicates that this person is a liar and often lies to the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about someone giving me money by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that a person sees himself taking money from someone he knows, as this indicates that this person replaces it with love and tenderness, and everything is in his favor, and indicates good treatment by this person. Corn. Ibn Sirin believes that when a fortuneteller sees himself taking money from someone he knows but is in disagreement with in reality, this indicates that the dispute between them will soon end. Ibn Sirin showed that if someone saw in a dream that someone was giving him money, it could be that A sign that this person has good feelings but cannot express his feelings. Ibn Sirin believes that when a fortuneteller sees someone giving him old paper money, this indicates that this person is actually a liar and lies a lot to the fortuneteller. Ibn Sirin interpreted the person who sees himself taking Coins from a person as one of the praiseworthy visions where the dreamer predicts that he is about to hear some good news. Ibn Sirin also showed that receiving money in a dream is evidence that God will decree goodness for the world soon, God willing. Interpretation of dreams of someone giving you money in Nabulsi, Al-Nabulsi explained When the fortuneteller sees himself receiving money, this is a sign that he will receive compensation for his effort and fatigue during the past period. Al-Nabulsi sees that the person who receives money in his dream from someone he knows and has a favorite traveler, this indicates that the date of the traveler’s promotion is approaching and that he is on a date to see him soon. If he is a god. Al-Nabulsi explained that when a fortune teller dreams of a bank note in a dream, God gives him a male child.

title: Interpretation of a dream about worms walking on the body in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about worms walking on the body in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about worms walking on the body in a dream. The two worlds. Interpretation of a dream about worms walking on the body in a dream: Worms walking on the body in a dream may indicate the presence of some enemies and competitors in the dreamer’s life at that time. The emergence of worms from the body may indicate rejection of the evil that the dreamer suffered in those days. In the case of his personal opinion that worms were coming out of him, this may indicate that he was deceived and deceived by one of the people around him. A person’s dream of worms entering his body may indicate that he is collecting money that is not permissible and he must stop that. Interpretation of a dream about walking among green trees in a dream in case If one sees that he is walking among green trees, this may indicate the enormous livelihood that the dreamer was enjoying at that time. Walking among green trees in a dream, we may find that the person has gotten rid of many of the problems that he was suffering from at that time. In the case of my personal opinion, that he was walking among green trees, this may indicate the coming goodness for him and the positive changes that occurred in his life at that time. Dreaming of walking among green trees in a dream may indicate a woman’s upcoming pregnancy or good changes that will occur in her life. The dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking by crawling in a dream: In the case of his personal opinion that he was crawling, this may indicate his need to seek knowledge at that time. Crawling in a dream may indicate that the dreamer has to go for Hajj or Umrah during those days. Walking in a dream could indicate hypocrisy in religion or deception and hypocrisy. Whoever sees in his dream that he is crawling on the ground, perhaps it indicates his distance from God Almighty, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about walking with a work colleague in a dream in a certain situation If someone saw that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate a new project that the dreamer is entering into during this period. Walking with a colleague in a dream could indicate success at work and the completion of tasks. If a person saw that he was walking with his colleague, this may indicate He is an enthusiastic person who wants to continue his work all the time. Whoever sees in his dream that he was walking with a colleague, this may indicate getting rid of the stress and anxiety that he suffered from in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about walking to the groom’s wedding in a dream If one sees that He was walking in the groom's wedding, this may indicate that the owner of this world is far from the blessed and Almighty God, and he must repent and come closer to God. When entering the groom's wedding, there was a song and dance that could indicate the worries and misfortunes that the owner of the vision may face in His life in those days. Whoever sees in his dream that he was in the groom’s wedding, it could indicate that the dreamer will be far from the good things he did and should correct his fate. Interpretation of a dream about worms walking on the body in a dream: Worms walking on the body in a dream may indicate the presence of some enemies and competitors in the dreamer’s life at that time. The emergence of worms from the body may indicate rejection of the evil that the dreamer suffered in those days. In the case of his personal opinion that worms were coming out of him, this may indicate that he was deceived and deceived by one of the people around him. A person’s dream of worms entering his body may indicate that he is collecting money that is not permissible and he must stop that. Interpretation of a dream about walking among green trees in a dream in case If one sees that he is walking among green trees, this may indicate the enormous livelihood that the dreamer was enjoying at that time. Walking among green trees in a dream, we may find that the person has gotten rid of many of the problems that he was suffering from at that time. title: Interpretation of seeing sherbet in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: If a person sees a drink, this vision indicates joys, happy occasions, and good news. A single girl seeing red sherbet juice means in her dream that she will soon marry a good man, God willing. Then the color of sherbet symbolizes the worries and sorrows that the dreamer suffers from. Because the color of sherbet shows blood. Seeing a sick person wearing red sherbet means that his health will improve and he will recover soon, by the command of God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about distributing red drink: Seeing the dreamer distributing sherbet in a dream means that he will hear good news in the coming period, God willing. Some commentators have referred to that vision as juice. Sorbet in a dream symbolizes blood, hatred, anger and hatred, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. After that, if a married woman sees that she is drinking sherbet in her dream, this vision indicates that she will soon become pregnant by God’s command. A student seeing red sherbet in a dream will achieve great success in his studies and have a great relationship. Interpretation of a dream about rose sherbet. Ibn Sirin said that seeing rose sherbet in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and sorrows and the resolution of problems and disputes. Then seeing red rose sherbet in a fortune teller’s dream means that the dreamer will be blessed with good health and prosperity, and God is the Most High. Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing rose sherbet in a dream It means sadness, worry, worry, anguish, and extreme psychological fatigue. To dream of drinking rose sherbet means failure, and the dreamer’s feelings of despair, disappointment, and bad mood. Interpretation of a red drink in a dream: Seeing a person seeing frozen sherbet in a dream indicates the worries and sadness that the dreamer is suffering from. If the sleeper sees red wine in his dream, This vision means that the dreamer will live a happy life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, if the dreamer drinks a drink while sad, this means that he will hear bad news in the coming period. Seeing a pure red drink in the dreamer’s dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to a major financial crisis, and God knows best. Interpretation Dark red color in a dream. Dark red color in a dream indicates blood, hatred, gossip, hatred, anger, hate, and God is the Most High, the Most High. If one sees dark red juice in his dream, then this dream indicates fun, love, adoration, and happiness. I mean sherbet. In the dream of an unmarried girl, her life will change for the better in the period Coming, God willing. Then seeing a red drink indicates the happiness, stability and prosperity that the viewer enjoys in his life. Whoever sees that he is drinking sherbet in gatherings, this means that he will be harmed. Interpretation of drinking red sherbet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing red sherbet in a dream symbolizes... Affection and love that unite the dreamer and his lover. After that, seeing a group of cups filled with red sherbet juice indicates strong and interconnected social relationships. As for the pregnant woman seeing that she is drinking a lot of red wine, this indicates in her dream an easy birth, God willing. Then to see the prisoner drinking sherbet in His sleep symbolizes the nearness of rest and going out to life and enjoying it. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing yellow drinks or

preview.html: The interpretation depends on knowing the details of the dream and the condition of apricots in the dream, and through the following lines we will present all the social situations to explain eating apricots. Interpretation of the vision of eating apricots in a dream for one girl. An unmarried girl who sees herself eating apricots in a dream is a sign of her brilliance in life, vitality and activity. It means The dream also means that the dreamer will have a lot of money that he will rely on to build his career, such as doing a business. When an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is eating a ripe and healthy apricot, this symbolizes enjoying her good health. As for a girl who sees apricots tart and sour when she eats them In a dream. It is a sign that a major psychological crisis has passed and no one has felt it. If you see large-sized apricots in a dream, this indicates good fortune, nourishment, and good luck for the dreamer. The vision also means good news about the girl’s marriage in the near future. If the size Apricots are small and not fresh, this means that the fortuneteller will be exposed to a serious financial crisis. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing raisins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eating apricots in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing apricots in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign for the husband and children, and the number of apricots in the dream It symbolizes the number of children. A married woman who sees fruitless apricots in a dream indicates problems and marital quarrels for the viewer. It also symbolizes social problems in his relationships with others, whether they are related or not. When a married woman dreams that she is buying apricots from the market, and they are in season It is a sign that there is a lot of money on the way to her. The vision also indicates food, good luck, and hearing good news. As for seeing apricots out of season in a dream, this indicates her husband’s miserliness. Seeing apricot juice in a married woman’s dream means that she will enjoy good health and a happy life. A married woman who sees unripe apricots in a dream indicates her failure in raising children. Interpretation of the vision of eating apricots in a dream for a man and its meaning. As for a man who dreams of apricots in a dream, it is a metaphor for a lot of money that he will get in a short time. And a person who works in trade and dreams of buying Apricots from the market, this indicates a large profit that he makes from his trade. If a person sees himself eating apricots and enjoying them in a dream, this is a sign of good luck for the god. If you see an apricot pit in a man’s dream, it is a sign of nutrition according to the number of kernels that he does not see in the dream. But if the number of apricots is few in a man’s dream, this symbolizes a difficult situation and a lack of money. When a man sees an apricot in his dream, this is a sign that he is a disabled person and is not helpful to others. Seeing an apricot in a man’s dream is a sign that he is a hypocritical person. As for seeing Ripe apricots in a dream are a symbol of the believer’s loyalty and love for others. Read also: Interpretation of seeing peaches in a dream: eating, buying, and picking. The meaning of seeing apricots in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A sick pregnant woman sees apricots in a dream. It is beneficial

preview.html: Prison is the place designated for punishments for outlaws and criminals, and we will talk about the interpretation of these visions in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a visit to prison in a dream for a single girl When a single girl dreams of seeing a prison in a dream. It is an indication that she feels great pressure on herself in her daily life, and feels limited, God knows best. And the girl who is still studying and dreams of seeing a prison in a dream, it is a metaphor for her severe anxiety and tension from exams. As for the unmarried girl who dreams that she is visiting the prison, this dream symbolizes the approaching date of exams. Visiting the prison in a dream for an unmarried girl means relief from distress and emptiness, God willing. If the unmarried girl sees that he was visiting the prison and was close to her. It is a sign of solving a problem that was occupying her mind at home with her family. As for the engaged woman who saw that she was visiting the prison in a dream, she was disturbed. This indicates the approaching date of her marriage to a person she does not love and feels that she will live with him in prison, God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of escaping from prison Interpretation of seeing a visit to the prison in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams that she is visiting Prison and her husband accompanies her in a dream. It is a sure sign of the lack of happiness and stability of her marriage, God knows best. Seeing a prison visit with the husband for a married woman in a dream. It is a sign that her husband controls her tightly, imposes restrictions on her and she must adhere to them, God knows best. A married woman dreams that she is visiting prison and delayed childbirth. This dream shows her a feeling of suffocation and sadness due to the lack of pregnancy, God knows best. Seeing prison in a married woman's dream symbolizes problems and disagreements with the husband. As for the married woman, she watches herself visiting prison with people she knows. It is a story about being harmed by these people, God knows best. If a married woman dreams that she visits prison and leaves it. It is good news for the appearance of pregnancy. This may indicate that she is entering a new stage of her life in which she will be happy. Interpretation of seeing a prison visit in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man who dreams that he enters prison in a dream. This vision indicates that he is suffering from a major financial crisis that negatively affects his life, God knows best. Either a man sees himself with a group of colleagues and was visiting prison. It is a sign that these colleagues are managing a major dilemma for the visionary, God knows best. Seeing Prison for someone who is far from his family is a metaphor for the feeling of distress and suffocation from loneliness. And whoever sees that he is visiting prison and traveling in a dream, this is a sign of his longing and desire to return to his homeland. And the man who sees himself visiting prison and the place is very dark, this indicates the injustice that befalls the dreamer, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream and its meaning in detail The meaning of seeing a visit to prison in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation Seeing prison in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a feeling of exhaustion and pain during the months of pregnancy. As for the pregnant woman who dreams that she is visiting prison and crying a lot, this means comfort after childbirth and freedom from pain. The woman

title: Interpretation of night cricket in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a cricket in a dream, according to what was interpreted by the great scholar Ibn Sirin. Cockroaches are insects that disgust many people. There are types that crawl on the ground, climb walls, or fly, and there is a type that appears at night and makes a very annoying sound. A person can see this cockroach in his dream, and when he wakes up, this vision confuses him, so he resorts to the interpretations of interpretive scholars. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a cricket in a dream indicates that the dreamer is looking for stability in his life. If the dreamer grows cockroaches in his house, this is a sign of an unstable life. A stable full of errors. Seeing a cockroach in a dream means that the dreamer is committing bad deeds. If the sleeper dreams of a dead cockroach, this is a sign that he is trying to get rid of all the negativity and mistakes that he commits in his life. A quarrel with cockroaches in a dream indicates problems that the dreamer will be exposed to in his life. Seeing a cockroach White in a dream indicates the presence of a hypocritical and malicious friend. A red cockroach in a dream warns the dreamer of the arrival of happy news that will bring joy to his heart. If the sleeper sees in his dream a cockroach walking among his creation, then this vision warns the dreamer of the presence of some enemies in his life. Likewise, the dream of a cockroach entering To the house indicates the presence of enemies. A night cockroach in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a cockroach killed in a dream means getting rid of envious enemies. Seeing a cockroach coming out of the wall in a dream indicates the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is trying Escaping from a cockroach, this vision carries a warning that the dreamer will be exposed to envy and must be protected. Eating a cockroach in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to major disasters in his life, and seeing a cockroach in bed has the same meaning. Also, seeing a cockroach in a dream indicates the presence of a man. Notorious and malicious in the life of the fortuneteller. Black cockroaches in a dream indicate the presence of people trying to harm the fortuneteller through magic and sorcery. The cockroach in the dream of a single woman. Seeing black cockroaches in the dream of an unmarried girl means that she will suffer from envy and difficult problems. This vision also has the significance of interpreting that this girl is far from obedience to God Almighty, so she must repent and approach God again. Also, a cockroach in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the presence of enemies who are trying to harm and hurt her and the presence of someone who holds a grudge against her. Killing a cockroach in a dream An unmarried girl is one of the praiseworthy dreams that portends her getting rid of enemies, haters, and envious people. If an unmarried girl sees that she is escaping from a cockroach, she must be fortified with the Holy Qur’an, supplications, and remembrances. Seeing live cockroaches in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her separation and distance from the person she loves. Interpretation of a dream Cockroach for a married womanIf a married woman sees a night cricket in her dream, this is a sign of and
